root.name: DJ Life
root.description: IntroductionIn DJ LIfe, the player takes the role of a rookie DJ who is decided to become the best there is. In the journey to become the best there is the player will visit several major European cities like Paris, Berlin and London and will eventually travel state ward to Miami to reach a point where he will be able to fill a stadium with fans that will listen to his craft after of course haven proven him/her self in local clubs. Music CreationThe player will also be able to create his/her own songs using the in game music editor that allows up to four audio streams at once and a collection of about 200 Techno, House, Funk samples. Created songs can also be shared with friends via Nintendo Wi-Fi. TracklistDJ Life has over 40 songs essentially composed out of Electro and RB songs.
